import Navi from "../components/Navi"; const Profile = () => { const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(e.target.firstname.value); console.log(e.target.lastname.value); console.log(e.target.email.value); console.log(e.target.oldPassword.value); console.log(e.target.newPassword.value); console.log(e.target.confirmPassword.value); }; return (

Brown, Asher

Password requirements

To create a new password, you have to meet all of the following requirements:

  • Minimum 8 character
  • At least one special character
  • At least one number
  • Can’t be the same as a previous password
); }; export default Profile;
